name: Abdul-Qadir Ajani
story: Abdul-Qadir Ajani grew up in a small village in Iran. He was always fascinated by explosives and would often sneak out to the nearby mountains to experiment with them. His interest was encouraged by the village Imam, who believed that he had a gift from Allah. After finishing high school, Abdul-Qadir joined the Iranian military and was trained as a specialist in explosives. He quickly rose through the ranks and became a Recon Demo Specialist. Eventually, he was recruited by the OPFOR to put his skills to use against their enemies.
